patthana23.53:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.53:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.53:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
